reference.title: Side Navigation Menu of OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME Console

section.p: Side Navigation MenuOverviewThe Overview serves as the portal as well as one of the side navigation options on OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME console. It displays the current status of the OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME system. The green check indicates the endpoint is under the protection of Real-time Malware Scan and/or Application Lockdown, while the red cross indicates the endpoint is at risk.

For OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME agent with StellarICS license edition, below the green check or red cross icon, a shield-shape icon with a toggle on the left indicates whether the endpoint is currently protected by StellarProtect's Real-time Malware Scan; and a lock-shape icon with a toggle on the right indicates whether the Application Lockdown "Enforce" mode is enabled

For OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME agent with StellarKiosk license edition, below the green check or red cross icon, a shield-shape icon with the toggle indicates whether the endpoint is currently protected by StellarProtect's Real-time Malware Scan.

For OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME agent with StellarOEM license edition, below the green check or red cross icon, a lock-shape icon with a toggle on the right indicates whether the Application Lockdown "Enforce" mode is enabled.

The following current information about endpoint protection will be shown:
StellarOne registration: Green check indicates the OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME agent is successfully registered to a designated group via web console; red cross indicates registration to certain group is failed.
StellarOne group name: This item shows the group name the agent belongs to. When users mouse over the name of the group, information about group name, group ID, and policy version will appear.
Number of OT Apps: This item shows how many OT applications are in the endpoint.
Last OT inventory updated on: This item shows the date and time the OT Inventory was last updated on this endpoint.
Number of approved Apps: This item shows the number of the applications that have been added in the Approved List on this endpoint.
Last approved list updated on: The last time the Approve List was updated.
Last component updated on: The last time component was updated.
Last blocked event: Clicking the link shows the recent 1000 blocked events.
License expires on: This item shows when OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAMEâ€™s current license will expire.
Device Information: Clicking the link shows the endpoint's device information including Vendor, Model, Location, and Remark.

section.title: OT Applications
section.p: Side Navigation MenuOT ApplicationsThis function lists all OT/ICS application systems recognized by OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME on this endpoint, and lists the software name, vendor name, product version and installation path of each application system.

The number of OT/ICS application systems that OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME can recognize will continue to increase with updates to the OT/ICS Application Inventory, which is maintained by the TXOne research laboratory based on OT/ICS product analysis.
This information will be synchronized to the backend for device management.

section.title: OT Certificates
section.p: Digital signature is currently the most secure software product identification technology, which can ensure that the signed software component is not illegally modified, and can identify that the software was released by the original manufacturer.

The number of OT/ICS certificates that OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME can recognize will increasewith updates from the OT/ICS Application Inventory. This inventory is producedby the TXOne research laboratory and based on OT/ICS product analysis.
This information will be synchronized to the backend for management.

section.title: Approved List
section.p: Side Navigation MenuApproved ListApplications found during prescan are added in the Approved List. Users can add and search for applications in this window. Users can also import or export trusted hashes by clicking the three-dot dropdown menu.

section.title: Scan Components
section.p: Side Navigation MenuScan ComponentsThis navigation option list all critical scan engines and patterns with versions used by OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME.

section.title: Password
section.p: Side Navigation MenuPasswordThis navigation option functions as the OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME administrator password change. The user must enter the correct old password, enter the same new password twice, confirm that the length of the new password meets the requirements, and press Save to complete the change.

section.title: Settings
section.p: Side Navigation MenuSettingsThis section mainly describes the OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME configuration options. Refer to for the introduction of the seven main protection functions. Each function has a switch that can be turned on or off.

section.title: About
section.p: Side Navigation MenuAboutThis includes OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME product information, version and build number, as well as third-party license information.
